name: QEII Emergency Department
description: The Charles V. Keating Emergency and Trauma Centre at QEII Health Sciences Centre provides 24/7 emergency care.
location: Halifax Infirmary, 1796 Summer Street, Halifax, NS
referral_info: No referral required for emergency services
parking_info: Limited on-site parking available. Public parking nearby.
public_transit: Accessible by Halifax Transit bus routes.
